column5: This brand new custom built home has everything you want in a vacation home! The kitchen has everything you need to make and serve your meals, and nice size living area with comfortable furniture to relax after a fun filled day at the beach. The master bedroom has a queen size bed with an attached bathroom and private access to the back deck. The guest room has custom queen size bunk beds with an attached full bath. The third has queen size bunk beds with attached bath.
